flawed_nl_solution:
When you add up the temperature for the entire week, it comes to 40+50+65+36+82+72+26 = <<40+50+65+36+82+72+26=371>>371
These temperatures were over 7 days so the average temperature was 371/7 =<<371/7=35>>35 degrees
#### 35

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 53, not 35. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
